CustomField.description: Boolean value calculating whether the Project Task has been fully allocated. It is used by other formula fields for better readability. This is a system field and should never be visible.
CustomField.formula: /*When the Length measurement unit is Calendar Allocation and the task has been fully allocated return true*/ ISPICKVAL(project_cloud__Units__c, 'Calendar Allocation') && project_cloud__Allocated_Hours__c >= project_cloud__Estimated_Hours__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a system field and should never be visible.
CustomField.label: Calendar Allocating Completed
